title: Global Minima by Penalized Full-dimensional Scaling
abstract:
The full-dimensional (metric, Euclidean, least squares) multidimensional
scaling stress loss function is combined with a quadratic external penalty
function term. The trajectory of minimizers of stress for increasing values of
the penalty parameter is then used to find (tentative) global minima for
low-dimensional multidimensional scaling. This is illustrated with several
one-dimensional and two-dimensional examples.
